name: Fashionable Rubber Strap LED Watch with Colorful Lighting Display
description:
* Specifications:

    * LED lights display
    * Settings: Time, Date, Week, Bright degree
    * With Colorful lights: Red / Yellow / Green / Blue
    * Zinc alloy case with silver plating
    * Rubber strap
    * Antimagnetic, Shockproof
    * Stainless steel back
    * Support waterproof
    * Power: 2 x CR2032 lithium battery, pre-installed
    * Time Function: The blue light (at right) is on the " PM "
      - Hour: Each red light means one hour
      - Minute: Each yellow light means 5 minutes
      - Minute: Each Green light means one minute
      - Yellow light + Green light = Current minutes
    * Date function: The blue light (at right) is on the " DATE "
      - Month: Digits on the red light means months
      - Date: Each yellow light means 5 days
      - Date: Each Green light means one day
      - Yellow light + Green light = Current days
    * Week function: The blue light (at right) is on the " WEEK "
      - Week: Digit on red light means week
    * Color: Black
    * Approved: CE / FCC

name: Non-watertight LED Digital Watch with 44 Multi-colored LED Light
description:
* Specifications:

    * Screen: 44 multi-colored LED lights for time and date display
    * It is a red, yellow, green and blue LED digital watch but not waterproof
    * Settings: Time, Date, Day of the Week
    * Clasp: Two button safety design
    * Bracelet: - Segments: 10 - Segment length: ~ 10 mm - Length: ~ 170 mm - Material: Forged steel colored metal strap
    * Watch Face: Rectangular 33 mm x 57 mm
    * Function Buttons( right-side ): - Button (change mode ) - Top( hour and date display + select )
    * Power: CR2032 (x2) pre-installed
    * Press the top button to display the time on demand or else the watch will by default automatically flash the time every 6-10 minutes( this feature can be turned off )
    * This product provides several colors for selecting: Silvery and Black. Please write down your preferred choice at checkout.
    * Approved: CE / FCC

name: Rubber Strap LED Display Watch with Stainless Steel Cover and Waterproof
description:
* Specifications:

    * LED lights display
    * Settings: Time, Date, Week, Bright degree
    * Zinc alloy case with silver plating
    * Rubber strap
    * Antimagnetic, Shockproof
    * Stainless steel cover
    * Support waterproof
    * Insert Lithium cell batteries to power the device. Change the batteries when the luminosity is too weak.
    * It has 29 super bright LED lights that display the time as well as the date. It can light up automatically every 5, 10, 15, 20, 30 minutes
    * Press button A once for time, press button A twice for date. The " A " or " B " bright, it shows on time. " AM " morning, " PM " afternoon, and the " DATE " bright it shows on date. The left column (1 ~ 12): 12 hours: 12 months. The middle column(10 ~ 50): 10 minutes, 20 minutes,----50 minutes; 10 days, 20 days, 30 days. The right column(1 ~ 9): 1 minutes, 2 minutes----9 minutes; 1 days, 2 days----9 days.
    * Approved: CE / FCC

name: Waterproof Specially Designed LED Watch with 28 Multicolored LED Lights
description:
* Specifications:

    * 28 LED lights display
    * Settings: Time, Date, Display frequency
    * Zinc alloy case with silver plating
    * Leather strap
    * 1~3ATM waterproof
    * Antimagnetic, Shockproof
    * LED light color : Blue, Red, Orange
    * Approved: CE / FCC

    * Operational Guidance:

    * Pressing the nether button in 2 second into set mode, then the red LEDs will flash, and press the upper button to change hours.
    * Press nether button and yellow LEDs will flash, and then press the upper button to change minutes.
    * Press nether button and one yellow LED under the watch will flash, and then press the upper button to pen or close the function of automatic show time.
    * Press nether button and return to normal status.
